    3. Missing append statement

    Missing append statement

    First printing, page 252

    26 Jul 2014

    In the example code at the bottom of page 252, we're missing the line that appends the newly created tab to the tabs section of the DOM. To fix this, we simply need to modify the last few lines of the function so it looks like this:

            $("main .content").append($content);
        return false;
    });

    // add aElement to the tabs
    $("main .tabs").append($aElement);
});

    Thanks to James FitzGibbon for reporting this issue!

    About the Author

    Semmy Purewal, Senior Software Engineer at Netflix, spent nearly a decade teaching computer science and working as a freelance JavaScript consultant. During that time, he worked with a diverse group of clients that included start-ups, nonprofit organizations, and research labs.
